00029 #ifndef SC_CLOCK_H
00030 #define SC_CLOCK_H
00031 
00032 
00033 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_module.h"
00034 #include "sysc/communication/sc_signal.h"
00035 #include "sysc/tracing/sc_trace.h"
00036 
00037 namespace sc_core {
00038 
00039 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 //  CLASS : sc_clock
00041 //
00042 //  The clock channel.
00043 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 
00045 class SC_API sc_clock
00046   : public sc_signal<bool,SC_ONE_WRITER>
00047 {
00048   typedef sc_signal<bool,SC_ONE_WRITER> base_type;
00049 public:
00050 
00051     friend class sc_clock_posedge_callback;
00052     friend class sc_clock_negedge_callback;
00053 
00054     // constructors
00055 
00056     sc_clock();
00057 
00058     explicit sc_clock( const char* name_ );
00059 
00060     sc_clock( const char* name_,
00061               const sc_time& period_,
00062               double         duty_cycle_ = 0.5,
00063               const sc_time& start_time_ = SC_ZERO_TIME,
00064               bool           posedge_first_ = true );
00065 
00066     sc_clock( const char* name_,
00067               double         period_v_,
00068               sc_time_unit   period_tu_,
00069               double         duty_cycle_ = 0.5 );
00070 
00071     sc_clock( const char* name_,
00072               double         period_v_,
00073               sc_time_unit   period_tu_,
00074               double         duty_cycle_,
00075               double         start_time_v_,
00076               sc_time_unit   start_time_tu_,
00077               bool           posedge_first_ = true );
00078 
00079     // for backward compatibility with 1.0
00080     sc_clock( const char* name_,
00081               double         period_,            // in default time units
00082               double         duty_cycle_ = 0.5,
00083               double         start_time_ = 0.0,  // in default time units
00084               bool           posedge_first_ = true );
00085 
00086     // destructor (does nothing)
00087     virtual ~sc_clock();
00088 
00089     virtual void register_port( sc_port_base&, const char* if_type );
00090     virtual void write( const bool& );
00091 
00092     // get the period
00093     const sc_time& period() const
00094         { return m_period; }
00095 
00096     // get the duty cycle
00097     double duty_cycle() const
00098         { return m_duty_cycle; }
00099 
00100 
00101     // get the current time / clock characteristics
00102 
00103     bool posedge_first() const
00104         { return m_posedge_first; }
00105 
00106     sc_time start_time() const
00107         { return m_start_time; }
00108 
00109     static const sc_time& time_stamp();
00110 
00111     virtual const char* kind() const
00112         { return "sc_clock"; }
00113 
00114 
00115 #if 0 // @@@@#### REMOVE
00116     // for backward compatibility with 1.0
00117 
00118     sc_signal_in_if<bool>& signal()
00119         { return *this; }
00120 
00121     const sc_signal_in_if<bool>& signal() const
00122         { return *this; }
00123 
00124     static void start( const sc_time& duration )
00125         { sc_start( duration ); }
00126 
00127     static void start( double v, sc_time_unit tu )
00128         { sc_start( sc_time(v, tu) ); }
00129 
00130     static void start( double duration = -1 )
00131         { sc_start( duration ); }
00132 
00133     static void stop()
00134         { sc_stop(); }
00135 #endif
00136 
00137 protected:
00138 
00139     void before_end_of_elaboration();
00140 
00141     // processes
00142     void posedge_action();
00143     void negedge_action();
00144 
00145 
00146     // error reporting
00147     void report_error( const char* id, const char* add_msg = 0 ) const;
00148 
00149 
00150     void init( const sc_time&, double, const sc_time&, bool );
00151 
00152     bool is_clock() const { return true; }
00153 
00154 protected:
00155 
00156     sc_time  m_period;          // the period of this clock
00157     double   m_duty_cycle;      // the duty cycle (fraction of period)
00158     sc_time  m_start_time;      // the start time of the first edge
00159     bool     m_posedge_first;   // true if first edge is positive
00160     sc_time  m_posedge_time;    // time till next positive edge
00161     sc_time  m_negedge_time;    // time till next negative edge
00162 
00163     sc_event m_next_posedge_event;
00164     sc_event m_next_negedge_event;
00165 
00166 private:
00167 
00168     // disabled
00169     sc_clock( const sc_clock& );
00170     sc_clock& operator = ( const sc_clock& );
00171 };
00172 
00173 
00174 // IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII
00175 
00176 // processes
00177 
00178 inline
00179 void
00180 sc_clock::posedge_action()
00181 {
00182     m_next_negedge_event.notify_internal( m_negedge_time );
00183         m_new_val = true;
00184         request_update();
00185 }
00186 
00187 inline
00188 void
00189 sc_clock::negedge_action()
00190 {
00191     m_next_posedge_event.notify_internal( m_posedge_time );
00192         m_new_val = false;
00193         request_update();
00194 }
00195 
00196 
00197 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00198 
00199 class SC_API sc_clock_posedge_callback {
00200 public:
00201     sc_clock_posedge_callback(sc_clock* target_p) : m_target_p(target_p) {}
00202     inline void operator () () { m_target_p->posedge_action(); }
00203   protected:
00204     sc_clock* m_target_p;
00205 };
00206 
00207 class SC_API sc_clock_negedge_callback {
00208   public:
00209     sc_clock_negedge_callback(sc_clock* target_p) : m_target_p(target_p) {}
00210     inline void operator () () { m_target_p->negedge_action(); }
00211   protected:
00212     sc_clock* m_target_p;
00213 };
00214 
00215 
00216 } // namespace sc_core
